references.paper_title: Interior-point polynomial algorithms in convex programming
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the primal-dual interior point method, a core algorithm discussed and used in the IPM-LSTM approach.
This book is a standard reference for optimization methods, providing background and context for many of the techniques used in the paper.

references.paper_title: On the implementation of an interior-point filter line-search algorithm for large-scale nonlinear programming
references.reason: This paper details the IPOPT solver, which is used as a benchmark and compared against in the IPM-LSTM experiments.

references.paper_title: DC3: A learning method for optimization with hard constraints
references.reason: This paper introduces a learning-based approach to constrained optimization, providing a relevant comparison for the L2O techniques applied in IPM-LSTM.

references.paper_title: Machine learning for combinatorial optimization: a methodological tour d'horizon
references.reason: This paper provides a broad overview of learning to optimize (L2O) methods, which forms the basis for the learning-based approach taken in the IPM-LSTM method.
